name: Jazz on the A Train
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2019 at the NYU Game Center

Credits:

Andrew Petersell: Art and Animation

Tira Odhner: Programming

Carolyn Stallard: Sound Design

Jingyu Sui: Sound Design and Art

Mostafa Haque: Programming and Writing

Complete List of Songs Used:

Bebop_Clifford Brown & Max Roach - 1955 - Study in Brown - 09 Take the 'A' Train
Bebop_Charlie Parker - Now's The Time

Bebop_Dizzy Gillespie - Bebop

New Orleans_Kid Ory - Muskrat Ramble (1945) [Digitally Remastered]

New Orleans_It Ain't My Fault

Swing_Glenn Miller - In The Mood [HQ]
Swing_1932 HITS ARCHIVE_ It Don’t Mean A Thing (If It Ain’t Got That Swing) - Duke

WestCoast_Stan Getz - With Wind And The Rain In Your Hair
WestCoast_BARNEY KESSEL_SHELLY MANNE _RAY BROWN_POLL WINNERS THREE - Soft Winds
